speed: 40 ft., burrow 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.desc: The dracolich makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
legendary.desc: The dracolich makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 15 ft. must succeed on a DC 25 Dex save or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning and be prone. The dracolich can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: Drakharaz casts a spell of 6th level or lower from his list.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Heart of the Curse
traits.desc: Drakharaz is bound to the Heart's Curse. The Cursed Heart (if present) is a vulnerable point. If the Heart is destroyed, Drakharaz loses his Magic Resistance, his speed is halved, and he takes 50 necrotic damage at the start of each of his turns.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Drakharaz is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): Chill Touch, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation
1st level (4 slots): Shield, Ray of Sickness
2nd level (3 slots): Misty Step, Darkness
3rd level (3 slots): Counterspell, Animate Dead
4th level (3 slots): Blight, Dimension Door
5th level (3 slots): Cloudkill
6th level (2 slots): Circle of Death
7th level (2 slots): Finger of Death, Teleport
8th level (1 slot): Abi-Dalzim's Horrid Wilting
9th level (1 slot): Power Word Kill

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 ft. of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute.

actions.name: Necrotic Frost Breath (Recharge 5â€“6)
actions.desc: The dracolich exhales a blast of freezing rot in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Constitution saving throw, taking 52 (8d12) cold damage and 52 (8d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
